item.title: Solana Blockchain Meme Coin Memecoin Market Cap Briefly Surpasses $37 Million
item.description: On July 22nd, according to data from GMGN, the on-chain Meme coin of Solana briefly surged to a market capitalization of $37 million. Currently, it is at $29.5 million, with a 24-hour trading volume of $16.6 million and a 6-hour price increase of 81.96%.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins usually lack practical use cases and show large price fluctuations. Therefore, investment should be made with caution.

item.title: NASDAQ extends intraday loss to 1%, S&P 500 now down 0.35%
item.description: On July 22nd, based on market data, the intraday decline of the Nasdaq expanded to 1%, while the S&P 500 Index is currently down 0.35%. (Kryptonite)

item.title: Pendle Weekly Update: $55.9 Billion TVL Hits New All-Time High, Soaring Interest in Fixed Income Strategies
item.description: On July 22nd, Pendle's total value locked (TVL) for this week reached a new yearly peak, hitting $5.59 billion. Meanwhile, the total on lending platforms of Pendle PT exceeded $3 billion, with Aave holding the largest share, and the PT collateral totaling over $2.46 billion. The Pendle collateral scales for Morpho and Euler also reached $442 million and $67 million respectively, demonstrating the synchronous growth of Pendle's structured yield strategy across multiple protocols.The current market's focus on the PT-sUSDe (Sep 2025) annualized yield has risen to 11.11%. Since the returns from the July contract have been mostly released and the price is close to the principal, Pendle reminds users to migrate their funds to the September contract early to lock in their fixed income. Currently, on-chain data shows that approximately $1.9 billion is about to flow out of the July series and be redeployed, which is expected to dilute the new PT yield, making it a low-competition and high-yie

item.title: The U.S. Congress Releases Draft of Cryptocurrency Market Structure Discussion
item.description: On July 22nd, the U.S. Congress made public a Discussion Draft on Cryptocurrency Market Structure. (Golden Finance)

item.title: Payment giant Western Union Joins Stablecoin Race, Seeks Crypto Industry Partners
item.description: On July 22nd, as per Cointelegraph, the payment behemoth Western Union is delving into the integration of stablecoins into its service system with the aim of spurring the modernization of cross-border payments.Western Union's CEO, Devin McGranahan, asserted that the company views stablecoins as an opportunity rather than a menace. He disclosed that Western Union is currently engaged in discussions with the key players in the crypto industry to launch stablecoin on-ramp/off-ramp services and digital wallet functionalities.

item.title: PancakeSwap Infinity has officially launched on the Binance Smart Chain.
item.description: On July 22nd, according to official information, PancakeSwap has declared that its significant upgraded product, PancakeSwap Infinity, has officially made its debut on the Base network. PancakeSwap Infinity is tailored for different types of DeFi users and possesses the following core characteristics:1. A dual-pool mechanism that supports multiple liquidity strategies;2. Customizable dynamic fees based on smart contract "Hooks";3. A gas-saving architectural design to keep transaction costs low;4. It is fully open source, enabling developers to freely build and innovate.

item.title: Telegram Encrypted Wallet is now live for 87 million US users
item.description: On July 22nd, as reported by CNBC, U.S. users are now able to directly send, receive, and manage cryptocurrency within the Telegram application without the necessity of making additional downloads, using browser plugins, or having separate logins.The TON Wallet has been integrated into the Telegram interface and started to be rolled out in the U.S. this week. It is a self-hosted cryptocurrency wallet that enables users to control their private keys.This service is developed by The Open Platform (TOP) and is built on the TON blockchain, allowing users to effortlessly send stablecoins and other digital tokens to their contacts just as they would send messages. According to the official announcement, this is the first self-hosted cryptocurrency wallet embedded in a mainstream communication platform in the U.S. market.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Influencer Crypto Beast Exposed for Orchestrating ALT Flash Crash Event, Implicated in Cash Out Scheme of Over $11 Million
item.description: On July 22nd, Crypto Detective ZachXBT made a post on X, suggesting that Crypto KOL "Crypto Beast" was suspected of planning and manipulating an ALT token, causing its market cap to plummet from $190 million to $3 million. On July 14th, a large number of internal wallets sold more than $11 million worth of $ALT in a short time, resulting in the price crashing from $0.19 to $0.003.According to on-chain analysis, Crypto Beast had previously actively promoted ALT on X and Telegram and shared its public wallet address in the posts (which have now been deleted). Analysts traced the connection of this address to multiple side wallets transferred through Celestia, with funds flowing through various instant exchanges such as KuCoin, Binance, and others.More than 45 wallets were linked to Crypto Beast, and all of them collectively dumped the token on July 14th. In addition, he had used similar tactics in multiple projects and was suspected of being involved in rug-pulling multiple tokens, s

item.title: Soluna has secured a $20 million investment from Spring Lane Capital to launch the Kati 1 project construction.
item.description: On July 22nd, as reported by businesswire, the data center developer Soluna Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: SLNH) declared today that it has successfully completed its latest round of financing. The funding was provided by Spring Lane Capital (SLC) to facilitate the expansion of its Kati project in Texas to 35 megawatts, thereby officially commencing the Kati 1 project.With this financial support, Soluna intends to initiate the construction of the Kati 1 project in the third quarter of 2025 and aims to achieve the initial power-on and gradually commence production by the first quarter of 2026. The new facility is engineered to accommodate approximately 12,000 next-generation Bitcoin mining machines.

item.title: ARK Invest Acquires $182 Million in BMNR Common Stock, Boosting Ethereum Treasury Strategy
item.description: On July 22nd, as per PR Newswire, BitMine declared today that ARK Invest has purchased 4,773,444 shares of BitMine common stock BMNR, and the total value amounts to 182 million US dollars. BitMine intends to utilize all net proceeds (approximately 177 million US dollars) to acquire Ethereum (ETH).
